briefdescription.para: Stores the client's internal configuration and states.

detaileddescription.para: Before RF_open() can be called, an instance of RF_Object must be created where the RF driver can store its internal configuration and states. This object must remain persistent throughout application run-time and must not be modified by the application.

The size of RF_Object can be optimized for single-mode applications by providing a RF_SINGLEMODE symbol at compilation time. The pre-built single-mode archive was generated with this symbol defined, hence any project using this archive must also define RF_SINGLEMODE on project level.

simplesect.para: Except configuration fields before call to RF_open(), modification of any field in RF_Object is forbidden.
